mapper.select: select classification.id cid, classification.className, classification_option.id oid, classification_option.optionName from classification left join classification_option on classification.id = classification_option.classId where classification.id = #{id};

select classification.id cid, classification.className, classification_option.id oid, classification_option.optionName, equipment.id eid, equipment.location, equipment.`name`, equipment.power, equipment.state from classification left join classification_option on classification.id = classification_option.classId LEFT JOIN equipment_classification_option ON classification_option.id = equipment_classification_option.optionId LEFT JOIN equipment ON equipment.id = equipment_classification_option.eid where classification.id = #{id};
